extDesc.message: Create a personal appear.in video chatroom to share with your friend in Facebook Chat or Twitter’s Direct Messages interface.

extendedDescription.message: This extension adds a small button to the Facebook chat and Twitter DM interfaces. When you click this button, a link to a private appear.in conversation is generated. You can then share this link with your contact to immediately start a video conversation.

extLabel.message: Start a video call via appear.in
